mapper.insert: insert into friend_circle(id, user_id, message, user_name, upload_list, created_at, bucket_path) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{message}, #{userName}, #{uploadList}, #{createdAt}, #{bucketPath})
mapper.select: SELECT fc.id, fc.user_id as userId, fc.message, fc.user_name as userName, fc.upload_list as imageList, fc.created_at as createdAt, fc.bucket_path as bucketPath, us.avatar FROM friend_circle AS fc INNER JOIN user AS us ON fc.user_id = us.id WHERE fc.user_id IN (SELECT friendId FROM friend_list WHERE openId = #{userId}) OR fc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY fc.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into like_circle(id, user_id, circle_id, avatar, created_at) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{circleId}, #{avatar}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, avatar as avatar, circle_id as circleId, created_at as createdAt from like_circle where like_circle.circle_id in #{id} ;
mapper.insert: insert into friend_circle_comment(id, circle_id, user_id, user_name, comment_message, receiver_id, receiver_name, created_at) values (#{id}, #{circleId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{commentMessage}, #{receiverId}, #{receiverName}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select id, circle_id as circleId, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, comment_message as commentMessage, receiver_id as receiverId, receiver_name as receiverName, created_at as createdAt from friend_circle_comment where circle_id in #{id} ;
